title: how to handle business and friendship
itunes:title: how to handle business and friendship
description:
Brooke and Danielle are deep diving into what it means to be best friends and business partners!  The gals share their best tips for running a business with a friend, discuss how they both make it work, and why they think it works!  Brooke and Danielle also catch up on a very influencer-y weekend, and Danielle discusses having her best friend, Delaney, in town!   Be sure to tag @galsonthegopodcast in your listening selfies and stories!
